name: market for industrial furnace, coal, 1-10MW | industrial furnace, coal, 1-10MW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9649/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'industrial furnace, coal, 1-10MW', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the product of a industrial furnace that is used for industrial appplications.  It operates with coal, it has a capacity of 1-10 MW and a lifetime of  20 years. Here, a grate furnace is balanced, which burns hard coal qualities between gas-flame and bituminous coal. The process includes building materials, their decommission, energy consumption for construction and land use.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2815:Manufacture of ovens, furnaces and furnace burners
